solution_line_template: The store received {total_pallets} / {half_divisor} = <<{total_pallets}/{half_divisor}={paper_towels_pallets}>>{paper_towels_pallets} pallets of paper towels.
They received {total_pallets} / {fifth_divisor} = <<{total_pallets}/{fifth_divisor}={paper_plates_pallets}>>{paper_plates_pallets} pallets of paper plates.

Thus, the store received {total_pallets} - {paper_towels_pallets} - {tissues_pallets} - {paper_plates_pallets} = <<{total_pallets}-{paper_towels_pallets}-{tissues_pallets}-{paper_plates_pallets}={paper_cups_pallets}>>{paper_cups_pallets} pallet of paper cups.
